snippet: BERKALL--Barbara, a former entertainment executive, died March 28, 2016 at 84. Donations to the Adam Zakin and Karen Duthie Zakin Scholarship Fund via The Visual Arts Foundation, 220 East 23rd Street, Suite 609, New York, NY 10010. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BERKALL--Barbara, a former entertainment executive, died March 28, 2016 at 84. Donations to the Adam Zakin and Karen Duthie Zakin Scholarship Fund via The Visual Arts Foundation, 220 East 23rd Street, Suite 609, New York, NY 10010. 1/3
